title: Adams National Historical Park: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Danger        Historic Homes Closed Due to Heat Emergency  Alert 1 , Severity ,danger ,, Historic Homes Closed Due to Heat Emergency  Due to the heat emergency declaration, the historic homes are closed today. Park rangers are providing tours in the Stone Library. We apologize for any inconvenience.          High Temperatures  Alert 2 , Severity ,danger ,, High Temperatures  Please be advised that temperatures remain in the 90 degree plus range and will remain so for the next few days.  The historic houses (when open) are not air conditioned.  All are reminded to stay hydrated during this warm weather.     Information        Luggage Prohibited  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Luggage Prohibited  Pleased be advised, large bags and backpacks are not permitted in historic homes. Storage of these items is not available at the park. Please plan accordingly.
